wikipedia_page.main: Joshua Tetley (20 July 1778 – 26 August 1859) was the founder of the Tetley's Brewery in Leeds, England.  The brewery was founded in 1822 and Joshua Tetley bought the brewery for £400.  In 1839, Tetley made his son a partner of the business.  It is a common misconception that the former Tetley's huntsman logo was a depiction of Tetley.
